attributes.action: Remove penalties on kidbrooke park road bus lane
attributes.additional_details: Remove penalties for car driving on Kidbrooke Park road bus lane. The bus lane is very short, and so cars who mistakenly drive though it (especially at night), following the normal direction of the road (instead of the very abrupt chicane) should not be unfairly penalised.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority (it isn't clear from the petition which one authority this would be).
